data.name: Dodo Life
data.detailed_description:
Dodo Life is a game about a dodo who desperately tries to find the island where his species lives, avoiding as much as possible not being extinct on the way by cruel predators in a Jurassic era.

Be stealthy, avoid dangerous dinosaurs, collect multiple eggs and take them to a safe place to save your species. Ultilize scenario mechanics or even your own enemies to attack each other and open gaps to achieve their survival!

  • 30 handcrafted levels!
  • Stealth mechanics!
  • Dangerous dinosaurs!
  • Avoid predators!
  • Hide behind bushes or trees!
  • Run desperately for your survival!

data.short_description: Dodo Life is a game about a dodo that desperately tries to find the island where its species lives, avoiding as much as possible not being extinguished on the way by cruel predators in a Jurassic era.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
